ol.li: This protocol applies to all Space employees, contractors and visitors, and all operations including manufacturing facilities, technical centres, offices & administrative buildings where hot work may occur. All sites in all regions are expected to develop site specific procedures to comply with this protocol.

Requirements of this protocol will apply to the control of risks associated with hot work. Hot work can include any work that involves burning, welding, using fire- or spark-producing tools, or that produces a source of ignition.
